column1: Funeral arrangements are by McKoon Funeral Home at 38 Jackson Street where the family will receive friends on Monday evening between 6:00 PM and 8:00 PM. The funeral service will be on Tuesday
column2: June 23rd at 2:00 PM in the McKoon Funeral Home chapel with Reverend Mike Harris and Reverend F. D. McWhorter officiating. Interment will be in Oak Hill Cemetery.
